name: sls_utils
long_description:
Streamline Social Utilities (sls utils)
=======================================

A package of various recipes that come in handy, focused generally around Vagrant / VirtualBox web dev environments.

recipes.sls_utils::deploy_key: Creates a private key for the apache user for site deployments.
recipes.sls_utils::centos_profile: Ensure the /usr/sbin (and maybe other folers) are in the PATH var.
